TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Credential extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides base functionality for all Microsoft HealthVault service authentication credential types. This class is abstract.
Docs.remarks: Credentials serve as the basis for all authentication with the Microsoft HealthVault service. Each credential class implements a specific credential type. As more credential types are required, a new credential is required for each. You should inherit from this class only if support for a new HealthVault authentication credential type is required.

public void CreateAuthenticatedSessionToken (Microsoft.Health.HealthServiceConnection connection, Guid appId);
.method public hidebysig instance void CreateAuthenticatedSessionToken(class Microsoft.Health.HealthServiceConnection connection, valuetype System.Guid appId) cil managed

Docs.param: The client-side representation of the HealthVault service.
The HealthVault application identifier for which the request is made.
Docs.summary: Gets an authentication token in the context of the credential.
Docs.remarks: The resulting authentication result is inserted into . This method accesses the HealthVault service across the network. If the application ID specified is already in the dictionary, then the authentication attempt is not made and the cached authentication result is used.
Docs.exception: The parameter is null or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Health.Authentication.CreateAuthenticationTokenResult GetAuthenticationResult(valuetype System.Guid applicationId) cil managed

Docs.param: The application that was previously authenticated.
Docs.summary: Gets the credential's authentication results from prior successful authentications with the Microsoft HealthVault service.
Docs.remarks: The key of the dictionary is the application id of the application for which the authentication request was made. If an application ID is not present in the dictionary, then an authentication request has not been made for this application, and this method therefore returns null.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the credential's shared secret.
Docs.value: An instance of representing the shared secret.
Docs.remarks: When a credential is used to establish an authenticated session with the Microsoft HealthVault service, it uses a shared secret to authenticate data transmissions. If the credential does not support an authenticated session, this property will be null.
Docs.exception: The value is set to null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteInfoXml(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.summary: Generates the credential-specific XML that is sent to the HealthVault service.
Docs.remarks: When an inherited class implements WriteInfoXml, the method should produce XML in accordance with the HealthVault XML schema for the specific credential type. This method is only called internally and is subject to change.
